scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains issues of the alumni magazine, Criterion. The Criterion contains articles and photographs of interest to alumni as well as alumni news from individuals and classes. The Tufts Criterion replaced the Tufts Alumni Review as the official alumni magazine in 1969. For a short time in 1968, both magazines were produced. The Criterion was itself replaced in 1994 by Tuftonia.

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is processed and open for research

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains issues of The Tufts Criterion, which replaced the Tufts Alumni Review as the official alumni magazine in 1969. For a short time in 1968, both magazines were produced. The Criterion was itself replaced in 1994 by Tuftonia.
